title: A mental image of a spatial layout is called

content.question: Deandra creates a detailed mental image of the spatial layout of the biology lab where she will take her final exams. The mental image of the spatial layout is called which of the following?

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
